short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change token on Factorio.zone, Valheim.zone and Satisfactory.zone

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension that allows you to change your token on factorio.zone, valheim.zone or satisfactory.zone.

Usage:
1. Go to factorio.zone, valheim.zone or satisfactory.zone
2. Press "Change Token"

If the buttons are bugged on the first visit, just reload the page, it seems to occur rarely and only on a first visit.

Disclaimer: This extension is NOT developed by or associated with the developers of Factorio.zone, Factorio, Valheim or Satisfactory.
